ValidationRule.description: Requires Finicity Customer ID if the Sub-Type is Connection Issue or Missing Transactions
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Sub_Type__c,'Portal Error'), ISPICKVAL( Sub_Type__c, 'Missing Transactions')), ISBLANK( Finicity_Customer_ID__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the Finicity Customer ID to submit the case
